index.index-par1: Welcome to the search help for the company directory!
index.index-par2:
To find people in the directory, you can use filters and wildcards to refine your search. Here are
            some examples to help you:
index.index-par4: Use * to display all people in the company.
index.index-par6: Use mot* to display all people whose first name starts with "mot".
index.index-par7: Use *mot to display all people whose last name ends with "mot".
index.index-par8: Use mot * to display all people whose first name is "mot".
index.index-par9:
Use mot* f to display all people whose first name starts with "mot" and last name starts
            with
            "f".
index.index-par10: Use a to display all people whose name or first name contains the letter "a".
index.index-par11: Use col to display all people whose name or first name contains "col".
index.index-par13: Use >1999 to display all people born after 1999.
index.index-par14: Use <1999 to display all people born before 1999.
index.index-par15: Use 1980-1999 to display all people born between 1980 and 1999.
index.index-par16: Use 10/05/1999 to display all people born on May 10, 1999.
index.index-par17: Use 1999 to display all people born in 1999.
index.index-par19:
Use (Presidency, Communication, Human Resources) col to display all people whose name or first
            name contains "col" and who are part of one of the following groups: "Presidency",
            "Communication", or "Human Resources".
index.index-par20:
Remember, you can combine multiple filters and wildcards to further refine your search. For
            example, you can use (Presidency) mot* to display all people whose first name starts with "mot"
            and who are part of the "Presidency" group.
